appName.message: TubeX: Your YouTube AI Copilot(Free Tool)

appDesc.message: Integrate the power of GPT AI and Google Translate into your YouTube, making it a great tool for learning foreign languages

note.message: Note: By default, TubeX supports free usage of Google Translate for users. If you want higher quality translations and the AI capabilities integrated in ChatGPT, please enter your OpenAI API KEY to use.

alert.message: Please click on the browser's extension icon in the top right corner and enter your OpenAI API KEY
